name.label: Name of the thread
name.tooltip: Name of the thread, be aware that the thread name is used also as a function name

floatingPoint.label: Floating point
floatingPoint.tooltip: Enable floating point for the current thread

stackSize.label: Stack size
stackSize.tooltip: Stack size of the current thread

priority.label: Priority
priority.tooltip: Priority of the current thread - must be unique across all threads under same core, higher value means also higher priority

peripheralAccessLowAddress.label: Peripheral access low address
peripheralAccessLowAddress.tooltip: In the case task needs access to the peripheral memory region, the low address needs to be set

peripheralAccessSize.label: Peripheral access size
peripheralAccessSize.tooltip: In the case task needs access to the peripheral memory region, the size needs to be set
